title: pm2 does not show error if permission denied to log file
body:
OS - Ubuntu 14.04.1 LTS
Node.js - 0.12.2
pm2 - 0.14.6

app.js:

``` javascript
var http = require('http');
http.createServer(function (req, res) {
  res.end('Hello World');
}).listen(9999);

console.log('Server running at http://127.0.0.1:9999/');
```

apps.json:

``` javascript
{
  "apps" : [{
    "name":       "pm2",
    "script":     "app.js",
    "exec_mode":  "cluster",
    "instances":  0,
    "out_file":   "output.log",
    "error_file": "error.log",
    "merge_logs": true
  }]
}
```

Log files exist and, for example, owner of `output.log` is root (not simple user).

Run app:

```
pm2 start apps.json
```

Status is online but in fact app does not work:

